alert.note: Alert for Baker; Calhoun; Dougherty; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 3:59PM EDT until September 07 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... North central Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Eastern Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... South central Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 359 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Leary, or near Morgan, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Albany, Leary, Walker, Clarks Mill, Lockett Crossing, Bermuda, Holt, Ducker, and Cordrays Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
